about_the_game:
In this world, dinosaurs are extinct creatures, but in this game, you can become a hunter, cross time and space, come to the prehistoric forest, use bow and arrow, hunting dinosaur. Experience a thrilling dinosaur hunting journey.

Gameplay:

In the game, you will be in a dense forest, surrounded by towering mountain peaks, the roar of dinosaurs in the distance, you will feel the weight of the bow and arrow, the wind of wind and the threat of dinosaurs. You can follow your head tracking equipment, fully control your perspective, observe the surrounding environment, and find the trace of dinosaurs.



When you find a dinosaur, you can use the handle to pull the bow, aim and shoot arrows through the handle to accurately hit the deadly part as much as possible to defeat it. However, hunting dinosaurs are not easy. The dinosaurs are very powerful, and some can even tear you into fragments in an instant. Therefore, you need to improve your skills and equipment through continuous practice and upgrade in order to gain a foothold in the dinosaur world.



You need to act with caution and always be vigilant, because dinosaurs may appear around you at any time. If you are attacked by dinosaurs, you will lose your life. Therefore, before each hunting, you need to ensure that your health is good and ready to deal with the emergencies at any time.



In short, this game can not only make you feel the stimulus of hunting dinosaurs, but also improve your response speed and shooting skills. If you want to experience a real dinosaur hunting journey, then this is a good choice. Come and join this thrilling and exciting world to challenge your limits!

Operation method:

Shooting: the right handle trigger button
Forward: The left handle is up/down/down
Right: Left handle left/right
Turn: Right handle left/right
Passing: menu key

name: VR Dinosaur Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: Steam VR/ HTC VIVE

short_description: In this world, dinosaurs are extinct creatures, but in this game, you can become a hunter, cross time and space, come to the prehistoric forest, use bow and arrow, hunting dinosaur. Experience a thrilling dinosaur hunting journey.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
